name: index_at_region_bottom
description: Index (ESC D) at bottom of scroll region scrolls up within region
comment: Print A(0,0), B(1,0), C(2,0); set region rows 1-3 (0-2); CUP(3,1) → (2,0) bottom of region; ESC D index scrolls: A evicted to scrollback, B→(0,0), C→(1,0), blank at (2,0); print D at (2,0); cursor at (2,1)
